1.text: This is the book of Adamâ€™s generations. In the day that God created man, in the likeness of God made he him.

2.text: Male and female created he them; and blessed them, and called their name Adam, in the day when they were created.

3.text: And Adam lived a hundred and thirty years, and begot [a son] in his likeness, after his image, and called his name Seth.

4.text: And the days of Adam after he had begotten Seth were eight hundred years; and he begot sons and daughters.

5.text: And all the days of Adam that he lived were nine hundred and thirty years; and he died.

6.text: And Seth lived a hundred and five years, and begot Enosh.

7.text: And Seth lived after he had begotten Enosh eight hundred and seven years, and begot sons and daughters.

8.text: And all the days of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years; and he died.

9.text: And Enosh lived ninety years, and begot Cainan.

10.text: And Enosh lived after he had begotten Cainan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begot sons and daughters.

11.text: And all the days of Enosh were nine hundred and five years; and he died.

12.text: And Cainan lived seventy years, and begot Mahalaleel.

13.text: And Cainan lived after he had begotten Mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years, and begot sons and daughters.

14.text: And all the days of Cainan were nine hundred and ten years; and he died.

15.text: And Mahalaleel lived sixty-five years, and begot Jared.

16.text: And Mahalaleel lived after he had begotten Jared eight hundred and thirty years, and begot sons and daughters.

17.text: And all the days of Mahalaleel were eight hundred and ninety-five years; and he died.

18.text: And Jared lived a hundred and sixty-two years, and begot Enoch.

19.text: And Jared lived after he had begotten Enoch eight hundred years, and begot sons and daughters.

20.text: And all the days of Jared were nine hundred and sixty-two years; and he died.

21.text: And Enoch lived sixty-five years, and begot Methushelah.

22.text: And Enoch walked with God after he had begotten Methushelah three hundred years, and begot sons and daughters.

23.text: And all the days of Enoch were three hundred and sixty-five years.

24.text: And Enoch walked with God; and he was not, for God took him.

25.text: And Methushelah lived a hundred and eighty-seven years, and begot Lemech.

26.text: And Methushelah lived after he had begotten Lemech seven hundred and eighty-two years, and begot sons and daughters.

27.text: And all the days of Methushelah were nine hundred and sixty-nine years; and he died.

28.text: And Lemech lived a hundred and eighty-two years, and begot a son.

29.text: And he called his name Noah, saying, This [one] shall comfort us concerning our work and concerning the toil of our hands, because of the ground which Jehovah has cursed.

30.text: And Lemech lived after he had begotten Noah five hundred and ninety-five years, and begot sons and daughters.

31.text: And all the days of Lemech were seven hundred and seventy-seven years; and he died.

32.text: And Noah was five hundred years old, and Noah begot Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
